title: Eye Magazine
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20130301070244/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Publications](http://web.archive.org/web/20130301070244/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Publications) : Eye Magazine**

**Publisher:** Haymarket Publishing (UK)  
**Editor:** [John L. Walters](http://web.archive.org/web/20130301070244/http:/typophile.com/wiki/John%20L.%20Walters)  
**Frequency:** Quarterly

A British graphic design magazine founded in 1990 by British design critic [Rick Poynor](http://web.archive.org/web/20130301070244/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Rick%20Poynor). He left the post as editor of the magazine in 1997, but still writes a column in every issue.

**Website:** [www.eyemagazine.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130301070244/http:/www.eyemagazine.com/)
author: Conor
